name: Exorcists - PvP Ghost Hunting
description:
Enter a supernatural world where one of your friends have become an evil entity. It's hunt or be hunted. Can you take down the spirit before they take you down? 

This is an online game where one of the players will become the ghost. The ghost must try to scare the other players as much as possible to be able to start a hunt and try to kill all the other players. The ghost hunters must try to survive and find evidence to be able to exorcise the evil spirit.

Requires an online connection. Requires at least two players to start a game.
